item.description:
Hey, Something new (at least to me). Lets go check out an nice little airport with a very newly paved runway! It has painted stripes and everything! We can even work off our meal with a short walk back from the snack shack!

http://www.navmonster...

0B5 Turners Falls has a nice little Take-out and Ice Cream place called "Country Creemee". It stays open until 9 pm each night. When you fly in, you'll need to park at the FBO that's midfield on the west side. It's then just a 3-4 minute walk up the hill.

Here you'll find an assortment of take-out diners and ice-cream. Picnic tables are located outside. Not sure if there is indoor seating. If you park at the north end, you'll be faced with a long walk.

Oh, the runway has just been repaved. If landing on RWY 16, you'll have to back taxi because no taxiway at the end.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Country Creamee, Dinner and ice cream at the falls
